Source Statement:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE update_bonus (
    p_emp_id IN NUMBER, p_emp_id1 IN NUMBER
)
AS
Target Statement:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE update_bonus (
    IN p_emp_id INTEGER
)
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $$

Source Statement:
CURSOR emp_cur IS
        SELECT emp_id, salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = 10;

-- Check if employee exists
    SELECT COUNT(*) INTO v_exists FROM employees WHERE emp_id = p_emp_id;
Target Statement:
-- Check if employee exists
    SELECT COUNT(*) INTO v_exists FROM employees WHERE emp_id = p_emp_id;

Source Statement:
-- Fetch salary
    SELECT salary INTO v_salary FROM employees WHERE emp_id = p_emp_id;
Target Statement:
-- Fetch salary
    SELECT salary INTO v_salary FROM employees WHERE emp_id = p_emp_id;

Source Statement:
-- Update bonus
    UPDATE employees SET bonus = v_bonus WHERE emp_id = p_emp_id;
Target Statement:
-- Update bonus
    UPDATE employees SET bonus = v_bonus WHERE emp_id = p_emp_id;

Source Statement:
-- Loop example
    FOR rec IN emp_cur LOOP
Target Statement:
-- Loop example
    FOR rec IN
        SELECT emp_id, salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = 10
    LOOP
RAISE NOTICE 'Emp ID: %, Salary: %', rec.emp_id, rec.salary;
